channel.title: [Project] Cosmic-scape [Project]
channel.description:
Hi everybody im Paymon! I come to you today to seek assistance in my new project "cosmic"."cosmic" is gonna be 2 servers, normal server and pk server. The pk server is gonna come out first. About cosmic well guys i have some good ideas but here's the main 1 of em:
[b]This is what i need:[/b] •BETA Testers •Client Developers •Hosters •Coders •website maker •webclient maker •logo maker
[b]ok so about the server:(SORRY I COULDNT GET ANY PICS)[/b] •It is gonna be a pk server. •You can get pk points. •New prayer book. •godswords,bandos,armadyl armour can be obtained from pk points. •donating will get unlock vls,sol,claws and vestas armour. •no spawning or duping. •thieving,pk points can obtain money or 50mill is given every day to donators. •custom donation items
The rest is gonna be like any normal server but i havnt figured out where the home is gonna be
[b]Please apply like this[/b]
[sub]Name- Age- What are u applying for? How much experience you have in this field? What is your msn?[/sub]
Ok so finally all people that apply will gain either mods place or admins place. I will be the owner and the co owner will be the person that helps me most.
[b]We will work out the financial side on msn.[/b]

item.title: [Project] Cosmic-scape [Project]
item.dc:creator: @paymon paymon
item.description:
@paymon wrote:

Hi everybody im Paymon!
I come to you today to seek assistance in my new project “cosmic”.“cosmic” is gonna be 2 servers, normal server and pk server. The pk server is gonna come out first.
About cosmic well guys i have some good ideas but here’s the main 1 of em:

This is what i need:
•BETA Testers
•Client Developers
•Hosters
•Coders
•website maker
•webclient maker
•logo maker

ok so about the server:(SORRY I COULDNT GET ANY PICS)
•It is gonna be a pk server.
•You can get pk points.
•New prayer book.
•godswords,bandos,armadyl armour can be obtained from pk points.
•donating will get unlock vls,sol,claws and vestas armour.
•no spawning or duping.
•thieving,pk points can obtain money or 50mill is given every day to donators.
•custom donation items

The rest is gonna be like any normal server but i havnt figured out where the home is gonna be

Please apply like this

[sub]Name-
Age-
What are u applying for?
How much experience you have in this field?
What is your msn?[/sub]

Ok so finally all people that apply will gain either mods place or admins place. I will be the owner and the co owner will be the person that helps me most.

We will work out the financial side on msn.

Read full topic
